content: this legal text summarizes a case involving two parties referred to as the appellant and the respondent the appellant filed an appeal challenging a decision made by a lower court regarding data the lower court ruled in favor of the respondent but the appellant argued that errors were made in the decision and requested the higher court to review the case the higher court reviewed the arguments and evidence presented by both parties and made a decision on the appeal the court either upheld the decision of the lower court or overturned it the courts decision on the appeal is final and cannot be further challenged the text also mentions a separate legal case involving the division of assets between former spouses the court of appeal has sent the case back to the court of first instance for a new trial the text refers to various laws and a court decision and the outcome of the case depends on the validity of these laws the costs of the appeal will be decided later overall the legal procedure in this case has been completed and the case will now be reexamined by the lower court

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Višjega sodišča v Mariboru I Cp 884/2021, 1. 2. 2022
